text: HRaly 7ez4 rTHNfqfeazrut (Tsw 4Rdet & rHPf 4AT4, HRa HTT) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) HN4 J4d 0-5 0 6, #qzr-10, ERQI, 78 facoif 110 075 0 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 3M4/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Administration /2024 Policy Circular No.1.7.1.23/2024 dated 04th July, 2024 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. DESIGN-22/2/2024- Design Division (Comp. No. 253593)} Sub: Hiring of Design Experts to Support Design Division Ref: NHAI Policy Circular No. 1.7.1.19 dated 03.08.2023. Vide policy circular cited under reference, Design Division has been set up at NHAI HQ: In order to establish in-house capacity of Design Division, a team of Advisors Joint Advisors (EPs) , Bridge Design Experts, Tunnel Experts, RE Wall Experts, Geotech Experts are required. Further, Executive Committee (EC) in its 617th meeting held on 07.06.2024 has directed to explore the to form a team of various experts on contract basis. 2 Composition of Design Experts Team: The Design Experts Team will comprise of following experts 1 members to support Division: S.No. Name of the post No. of posts" Sr Structural Engineer 2 Bridge Design Engineer 2 3 Geotechnical Engineer 4 Hydrology and Hydraulic Expert 1 5 Sr. Tunnel Engineer 1 6 Tunnel Engineer 1 7 Geologist 1 8 Quantity Surveyor 1 Draftsman 2 No of posts may increase or decrease as per requirement with the approval of Chairman; NHAI: 3 Roles & Responsibility of Design Experts Team: The Design Experts Team will be assisting NHAI and advising them on all design related activities, some of which are listed below: To verify and comment on the comprehensive scheme prepared by the Design Consultant of Contractor Concessionaire   showing the layout   plan of various components of the scheme including footpaths, central verge, crash barriers etc: Contd_2I - '4a7m NHAI Reg: option Design Bridge
